wattwatt.interfaces.energyproviders.occasional

Interface IEngineGenerator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, IEnergyProviders, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EngineGeneratorConnector, EngineGeneratorInPort, EngineGeneratorOutPort

    public interface IEngineGenerator
extends IEnergyProviders
    The interface IEngineGenerator

    Description

    Defines the interface for our Engine generator. The Engine generator is an occasional energy source. He can produce energy depending on how much fuel he has.

    Created on : 2020-01-27

    Author:

    Bah Thierno, Zheng Pascal
